entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, also known as Tom Riddle. He is described as being close to Harry and giving him an ultimatum.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The Boy Who Lived, the main protagonist of the story. He is described as being in a situation where he has to make a choice between surrendering or fighting.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and one of Harry's friends. He is forced to follow Voldemort along with Harry.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Voldemort's snake, which is described as being worn around his shoulders after being freed from its enchanted cage.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort who are marching on either side of Harry and Hagrid through the darkness.

relationships.description: Voldemort gives an ultimatum to Harry, threatening him and his family if he does not surrender.
Voldemort is described as wearing Nagini around his shoulders after freeing her from her enchanted cage.
Harry and Hagrid are being marched through the darkness by a group of Death Eaters, who are forcing them to follow Voldemort.
Hagrid is forced to follow Voldemort along with Harry.
